sentences: On õppinud loodust nägema lahtisi silmi.
Ta on väärt tüdruk! .. Ainuke paha viga, et tal pole lahtisi silmi!
Need on ausad arutlused elust, elule vaatamine lahtiste silmadega, kompromisse tunnistamata.
context: The word 'silmadega' is the inessive case plural form of 'silmad' (eyes), meaning 'with eyes'. In this context, it forms the compound expression 'lahtisi silmi' and its variations which mean 'with open eyes' or referring to having an observant, receptive perspective. The expressions suggest being perceptive, alert, and willing to see things as they really are without preconceived notions.
